title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and Go library for pulling, running, and managing local LLMs with a built-in Model File format and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama) to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters (Maven Central).

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style pair-programmer.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin offering Copilot-like code completions powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipelines with Ollama embeddings and Chroma/Qdrant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models into channels/DMs with event streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spins up Ollama containers to run LLM-based tests or code reviews.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library (Hex: ollama) wrapping the Ollama REST API with GenServer-based clients.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a side-panel chat powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat client written in Qt6 and C++ that talks to Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and insert completions via Ollama.
